about_the_game:
Strike a deal with the Scarlet Contract Starter Pack! Look sophisticated with Runway's Bloody Transaction outfit and equip the vibrant Primordial Violet Weapon Wrap. You will also recieve 300 Rogue Bucks to use in the store to elevate your style.

This Pack Contains:
- Bloody Transaction Runway Outfit
- Primordial Violet Primary Weapon Wrap
- 300 Rogue Bucks
detailed_description:

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core i5-2320
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 555
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 3.20 ghz 12
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
